a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of trained teachers vs share of qualified teachers, primary
The horizontal axis shows the share of teachers who have received the minimum organized training required for teaching at the
primary level in the given country. The vertical axis shows the share of teachers who have the minimum academic qualifications
necessary to teach at the primary level in a given country. Qualifications are usually related to the subject(s) they teach.
Percentage of teachers in primary education who are trained, both sexes (%)
Percentage of teachers in primary education who are
Data source: UNESCO Institute for Statistics
